changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.id, s.name AS service, st.name AS service_type, rr.name AS requester, po.name AS product, dt.name AS deliver_to, df.name AS deliver_from, at.name AS assign_to, u.name AS quantity_unit, base_table.stop_on_match, base_table.sequence_number, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM meta_protocol base_table JOIN existential s ON base_table.service = s.id LEFT JOIN existential rr ON base_table.requester = rr.id LEFT JOIN existential st ON base_table.service_type = st.id LEFT JOIN existential po ON base_table.product = po.id LEFT JOIN existential dt ON base_table.deliver_to= dt.id LEFT JOIN existential df ON base_table.deliver_from = df.id LEFT JOIN existential at ON base_table.assign_to = at.id LEFT JOIN existential u ON base_table.quantity_unit = u.id JOIN existential up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
